news_header: Teleste reported a positive turnaround in Q4 2024 with a 19% increase in telecommunications turnover, reaching EUR 36.5 million, and an adjusted operating result of EUR 0.8 million.
news_original_title: Telesteltä pirteät luvut loppuvuodelta – Yhtiöltä kasvuohjeistus ja osinkoyllätys
news_text: Teleste, a telecommunications technology company, announced its financial results for Q4 2024, showing a significant recovery with a turnover of EUR 36.5 million, up from EUR 30.6 million the previous year. The adjusted operating result improved to EUR 0.8 million, compared to a loss of EUR -1.4 million in the same period last year. Despite a decline in annual net sales to EUR 132.5 million from EUR 151.3 million, the company performed better than expected, leading to a proposed dividend of EUR 0.03 per share. Teleste anticipates net sales for 2025 to be between EUR 135-150 million, with an adjusted operating result of EUR 4-7 million, focusing on the second half of the year.
